name: Easy Fettuccine
author: Karla Essner

ingredients.name: (8 oz.) Velveeta Italiana Process Cheese Spread, cubed
to 9 oz. fettuccine, cooked and drained

instructions: Melt together Italiana cheese spread, milk, and Parmesan cheese in microwave or over low heat on stovetop. Stir in garlic powder. Add fettuccine; mix lightly. Serve immediately.
